overview: DVD release of 7 short films by François Ozon originally produced between 1993 and 2006.  They are: A Curtain Raiser [Un lever de rideau] (2006); X2000 (1998), Bed Scenes [Scènes de lit] (1998), Little Death [La petite mort] (1995), Truth or Dare [Action vérité] (1994), A Rose Between Us [Une rose entre nous] (1994), Victor (1993).
title: A Curtain Raiser & Other Shorts
